statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:

Where ��(n) denotes the number of positive integers �� n that are relatively prime to n.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The first line of the input contains an integer T , denoting the number of test cases. In each test case, there are three integers A, B, C in one line, as described above.
1 �� T �� 10, 0 < A, B, C �� 10^7

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case, output one line contains a single integer, denoting the answer modulo 2^30.
